name: Cartographer - Candidate Journey Mapping
description: Map and analyze a candidate's career journey, identifying patterns, transitions, and trajectory

questions.helpText: What stage is this candidate at in their career?
What pattern does their career trajectory show?
Are they moving to better companies, staying at same tier, or moving down?
How has their role/title progressed over time?
How long do they typically stay at companies?
Are they specializing in one area or staying broad?
List major transitions (e.g., startup to big tech, IC to management)
Any concerning patterns (gaps, demotions, very short tenures)
Positive patterns (promotions, tier-1 companies, consistent growth)
Based on their trajectory, what's their likely next career move?
2-3 sentence summary of their career journey

rendering.customCSS: .journey-timeline { position: relative; padding-left: 2rem; } .journey-timeline::before { content: ''; position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; bottom: 0; width: 2px; background: linear-gradient(180deg, #3b82f6, #8b5cf6); } .journey-node { position: relative; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding-left: 1rem; } .journey-node::before { content: ''; position: absolute; left: -2.5rem; top: 0.5rem; width: 12px; height: 12px; border-radius: 50%; background: #3b82f6; border: 2px solid white; box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px #3b82f6; }

iclFormat.systemPrompt: You are an expert career analyst mapping candidate journeys and identifying patterns.
